titleStmt.title: By the King wee haue (before this time) made knowen to our subiects vpon diuers occasions, that we haue receiued so great contentment in their generall conformitie ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first 3 lines of text.
"Giuen at our Honour of Hapmton Court, the eleuenth day of January, in the first yeere of our reigne of England, France and Ireland, and of Scotland the seuen and thirtieth."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
